headline: A Look At ServiceNow (NOW) Valuation After New OpenAI Agreement On Advanced AI Models
summary: ServiceNow (NOW) just signed a multiyear agreement with OpenAI to plug frontier AI models, including speech to speech capabilities, directly into its workflow platform. The goal is to broaden real world automation across IT, operations, and customer service. See our latest analysis for ServiceNow. The OpenAI agreement lands at a time when momentum in ServiceNow’s share price has cooled, with a 30 day share price return of 19.26% and a 90 day decline of 32.99%. Over the past year, the total...
